text: Bernard Francis "Bernie" McGann (22 June 1937 - 17 September 2013) was an Australian jazz alto saxophone player. He began his career in the late 1950s. He stayed active as a performer, composer and recording artist until his death. He was born in Granville, New South Wales. McGann died from complications following heart surgery on the night of 17 September 2014 in Sydney. He was 76 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bernie McGann at the Australian Jazz Real Book website Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian composers Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Jazz composers Category:Jazz musicians Category:Musicians from New South Wales Category:People from Sydney
title: Bernie McGann
